mapping.name: 重庆联通基础数据_WCDMA_%%Y.%%M.%%D.xlsx
mapping.sql:
SELECT CITY_NAME "城市名称", LAC "LAC", CI "CI", CELL_NAME "小区名", BTS_NAME "基站名称", SITE_SECTOR_TYPE "基站类型", BSC_NAME "RNC名称", VENDOR_NAME "设备厂家", ADM_AREA "行政区", RRU "RRU数量", DECODE(SITE_TYPE, '1', '宏基站', '2', '微蜂窝', '3', '室内', '') "网元类型", LONGITUDE "经度", LATITUDE "纬度", ROUND(ANT_HEIGHT, 0) "天线高度", ROUND(SITE_HEIGHT, 0) "海拔高度", ROUND(DIR, 0) "天线方向角", ROUND(DOWNTILT_ELECTR, 1) "电子倾角", ROUND(DOWNTILT_MACH, 1) "机械倾角", ROUND(ANT_PITCHANGLE, 1) "下倾角", ANT_SHARE "天线共用情况", ANT_TYPE "天线类型", DECODE(ISMOVEBYELECT, 0, '支持', 1, '不支持') "是否可以电调", POLE_TYPE "塔桅类型", EDT1 "设备类型", NEWCONF "站点配置", DECODE(CELLLEVEL, '0', '微小区', '1', '宏小区', '2', '微微小区', '') "逻辑小区的级别", "POWER" "天线发射功率", DECODE(PROJECT_STATE, '1', '开通', '2', '取消', '3', '暂缓', 4, '已拆除', 5, '建设', 6, '规划', '不确定') "工程进展", SERVICE_DATE "入网时间", VIPSITE "VIP站", INOUTROOM "室内室外", COVERTYPE "覆盖范围", DECODE(COVER_AREA_TYPE, 1, '密集城区', 2, '城区', 3, '郊区', 4, '乡村', 5, '其他', COVER_AREA_TYPE) "覆盖区域类型", SITE_ADD "基站站址", RADIOCAPACITY "扇区配置的无线容量", E1 "E1数量", FE "FE数量", TRANWAY "传输方式", DECODE(IS_SETUPTWR, 1, '是', '否') "是否安装塔顶放大器", RELATED_SECTORID "所属扇区编号", DECODE(IS_RRUCELL, 1, '是', '否') "是否为RRU小区", CELL_TRX_POW "小区配置的载频发射功率", UL_CE "配置的上行CE容量", DL_CE "配置的下行CE容量", IUB_ATMCONFBANDWIDTH "IUB接口ATM端口的配置带宽", IUB_IPCONFBANDWIDTH "IUB接口IP端口的配置带宽", IUCS_ATMCONFBANDWIDTH "IU接口ATM层配置带宽", IUCS_IPCONFBANDWIDTH "IU接口IP层配置带宽", IUR_ATMCONFBANDWIDTH "IUR接口ATM层配置带宽", IUR_IPCONFBANDWIDTH "IUR接口IP层配置带宽", REMARK "备注", TIME_STAMP "最后更新时间", RAC "RAC", SAC "SAC", BSC_ID "RNC编号", BTS_ID "基站编号", URA "URA编号", CELL_NUM "小区号", UARFCNUL "上行频点", UARFCNDL "下行频点", PRIMARYSCRAMBLINGCODE "主下行扰码", DECODE(HSDFLAG, 0, '支持', 1, '不支持') "是否支持HSDPA", DECODE(HSDSTAT, 0, '当前已挂起', 1, '当前已激活') "HSDPA功能状态", HSPDSCH_CODE "HS-PDSCH代码", BCHPOWER "小区中广播信道的功率[0.1DBM]", DECODE(HSUFLAG, 0, '支持', 1, '不支持') "是否支持HSUPA", DECODE(HSUSTAT, 0, '当前已挂起', 1, '当前已激活') "HSUPA功能状态", DECODE(MBMSFLAG, 0, '支持', 1, '不支持') "是否支持MBMS", DECODE(MBMSSTAT, 0, '当前已挂起', 1, '当前已激活') "MBMS功能状态", MICHCMNUM "MICH信道数", NBRCODHSPDSCH "SF=16的码字数", NBRCODHSSCCH "SF=128的码字数", NUMOFEAGCH "E-AGCH信道的初始数目", NUMOFERGHICH "E-RGCH/E-HICH信道的初始数目", PCPICHMAX "PCPICH信道最大发射功率[0.1DBM]", PCPICHMIN "PCPICH信道最小发射功率[0.1DBM]", PRIMARYCPICHPOWER "小区中使用的主导频信道的功率", PRIMARYSCHPOWER "小区中主同步信道的下行功率", CARRIER_LOAD "单载频容纳最大用户数", ZFZ_NUM "直放站数目", WIRE_LOAD_P "设计无线容量", TXPOWER "站点最大发射功率[0.1DBM]", ANT_INNERANGLE "内置下倾角", OUTSERVICE_DATE "退服时间", MAXIMUMTRANSMISSIONPOWER "小区的最大下行发射功率", EDT16 "一级场景", EDT17 "二级场景", NULL "共天馈小区", NULL "重庆区域覆盖", CITY_AREA "是否城区", DECODE(CELL_STATE, '1', '现网运行', '2', '新增网元工程', '3', '搬迁工程', 4, '替换工程', 5, '维护工程', 6, '退服', 7, '搬迁退服', 8, '替换退服', 9, '暂时关闭') "网管运行状态", DECODE(ADMIN_REGIONS, 1, '城区', 2, '县城', 3, '乡镇', 9, '其他') "所属行政区域类型", NULL "共天馈小区", NULL "共天馈属性", NULL "共站名称", NULL "共站属性", WCDMA."3G邻区1", WCDMA."3G邻区2", WCDMA."3G邻区3", WCDMA."3G邻区4", WCDMA."3G邻区5", WCDMA."3G邻区6", WCDMA."3G邻区7", WCDMA."3G邻区8", WCDMA."3G邻区9", WCDMA."3G邻区10", WCDMA."3G邻区11", WCDMA."3G邻区12", WCDMA."3G邻区13", WCDMA."3G邻区14", WCDMA."3G邻区15", WCDMA."3G邻区16", WCDMA."3G邻区17", WCDMA."3G邻区18", WCDMA."3G邻区19", WCDMA."3G邻区20", WCDMA."3G邻区21", WCDMA."3G邻区22", WCDMA."3G邻区23", WCDMA."3G邻区24", WCDMA."3G邻区25", WCDMA."3G邻区26", WCDMA."3G邻区27", WCDMA."3G邻区28", WCDMA."3G邻区29", WCDMA."3G邻区30", WCDMA."3G邻区31", WCDMA."3G邻区32", GSM."2G邻区1", GSM."2G邻区2", GSM."2G邻区3", GSM."2G邻区4", GSM."2G邻区5", GSM."2G邻区6", GSM."2G邻区7", GSM."2G邻区8", GSM."2G邻区9", GSM."2G邻区10", GSM."2G邻区11", GSM."2G邻区12", GSM."2G邻区13", GSM."2G邻区14", GSM."2G邻区15", GSM."2G邻区16", GSM."2G邻区17", GSM."2G邻区18", GSM."2G邻区19", GSM."2G邻区20", GSM."2G邻区21", GSM."2G邻区22", GSM."2G邻区23", GSM."2G邻区24", GSM."2G邻区25", GSM."2G邻区26", GSM."2G邻区27", GSM."2G邻区28", GSM."2G邻区29", GSM."2G邻区30", GSM."2G邻区31", GSM."2G邻区32", WCDMA."3G邻区33", WCDMA."3G邻区34", WCDMA."3G邻区35", WCDMA."3G邻区36", WCDMA."3G邻区37", WCDMA."3G邻区38", WCDMA."3G邻区39", WCDMA."3G邻区40", WCDMA."3G邻区41", WCDMA."3G邻区42", WCDMA."3G邻区43", WCDMA."3G邻区44", WCDMA."3G邻区45", WCDMA."3G邻区46", WCDMA."3G邻区47", WCDMA."3G邻区48", WCDMA."3G邻区49", WCDMA."3G邻区50", WCDMA."3G邻区51", WCDMA."3G邻区52", WCDMA."3G邻区53", WCDMA."3G邻区54", WCDMA."3G邻区55", WCDMA."3G邻区56", WCDMA."3G邻区57", WCDMA."3G邻区58", WCDMA."3G邻区59", WCDMA."3G邻区60", WCDMA."3G邻区61", WCDMA."3G邻区62", WCDMA."3G邻区63", WCDMA."3G邻区64" FROM NE_CELL_W NE LEFT JOIN (SELECT NE_CELL_ID, MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 1, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "2G邻区1", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 2, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "2G邻区2", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 3, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "2G邻区3", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 4, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "2G邻区4", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 5, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "2G邻区5", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 6, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "2G邻区6", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 7, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "2G邻区7", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 8, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "2G邻区8", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 9, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "2G邻区9", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 10, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "2G邻区10", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 11, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "2G邻区11", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 12, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "2G邻区12", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 13, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "2G邻区13", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 14, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "2G邻区14", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 15, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "2G邻区15", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 16, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "2G邻区16", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 17, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "2G邻区17", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 18, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "2G邻区18", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 19, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "2G邻区19", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 20, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "2G邻区20", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 21, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "2G邻区21", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 22, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "2G邻区22", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 23, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "2G邻区23", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 24, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "2G邻区24", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 25, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "2G邻区25", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 26, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "2G邻区26", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 27, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "2G邻区27", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 28, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "2G邻区28", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 29, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "2G邻区29", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 30, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "2G邻区30", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 31, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "2G邻区31", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 32, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "2G邻区32" FROM (SELECT NE_CELL_ID, NEI_NE_CELL_ID, NEI_LAC, NEI_CI, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY NE_CELL_ID ORDER BY 1 ASC) ROW_NUMBER FROM PARA_ADJ_W P WHERE P.INTRA_ADJ = 0 GROUP BY P.NE_CELL_ID, NEI_NE_CELL_ID, NEI_LAC, NEI_CI) GROUP BY NE_CELL_ID) GSM ON GSM.NE_CELL_ID = NE.NE_CELL_ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT NE_CELL_ID, MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 1, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "3G邻区1", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 2, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "3G邻区2", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 3, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "3G邻区3", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 4, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "3G邻区4", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 5, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "3G邻区5", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 6, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "3G邻区6", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 7, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "3G邻区7", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 8, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "3G邻区8", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 9, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "3G邻区9", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 10, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "3G邻区10", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 11, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "3G邻区11", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 12, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "3G邻区12", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 13, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "3G邻区13", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 14, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "3G邻区14", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 15, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "3G邻区15", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 16, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "3G邻区16", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 17, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "3G邻区17", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 18, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "3G邻区18", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 19, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "3G邻区19", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 20, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "3G邻区20", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 21, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "3G邻区21", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 22, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "3G邻区22", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 23, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "3G邻区23", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 24, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "3G邻区24", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 25, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "3G邻区25", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 26, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "3G邻区26", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 27, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "3G邻区27", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 28, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "3G邻区28", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 29, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "3G邻区29", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 30, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "3G邻区30", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 31, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "3G邻区31", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 32, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "3G邻区32", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 33, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "3G邻区33", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 34, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "3G邻区34", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 35, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "3G邻区35", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 36, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "3G邻区36", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 37, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "3G邻区37", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 38, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "3G邻区38", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 39, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "3G邻区39", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 40, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "3G邻区40", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 41, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "3G邻区41", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 42, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "3G邻区42", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 43, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "3G邻区43", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 44, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "3G邻区44", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 45, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "3G邻区45", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 46, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "3G邻区46", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 47, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "3G邻区47", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 48, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "3G邻区48", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 49, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "3G邻区49", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 50, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "3G邻区50", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 51, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "3G邻区51", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 52, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "3G邻区52", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 53, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "3G邻区53", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 54, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "3G邻区54", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 55, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "3G邻区55", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 56, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "3G邻区56", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 57, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "3G邻区57", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 58, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "3G邻区58", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 59, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "3G邻区59", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 60, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "3G邻区60", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 61, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "3G邻区61", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 62, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "3G邻区62", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 63, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "3G邻区63", MAX(DECODE(ROW_NUMBER, 64, NEI_LAC || '_' || NEI_CI, NULL)) "3G邻区64"
FROM (SELECT NE_CELL_ID, NEI_NE_CELL_ID, NEI_LAC, NEI_CI, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY NE_CELL_ID ORDER BY 1 ASC) ROW_NUMBER FROM PARA_ADJ_W P WHERE P.INTRA_ADJ IN (1, 2) GROUP BY P.NE_CELL_ID, NEI_NE_CELL_ID, NEI_LAC, NEI_CI) GROUP BY NE_CELL_ID) WCDMA ON WCDMA.NE_CELL_ID = NE.NE_CELL_ID
